Texts.Eng:
Strange spider-people clones from a totally different and maddened universe. Webbers are spider-human beings who were cloned by mistake, improperly. All throughout their "race", defects run wild. They are instinctively afraid of the dark.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, can eat raw meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20% Poison, +20% Cold
  +^green;10^reset;% Speed
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Webs
  ^green;In mod: Produces silk when wearing silk collection packs and immunity to plagued food.^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^orange;Nyctophobic (run 10% faster while losing 5% max health and power in darkness)^reset;
  Lush, Forest, Rainforest and Savannah biomes: x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% E. Regen
  Cold biomes: Health x^green;1.2^reset;, -^red;50^reset;% E. Regen
  Radioactive and proto planets: Health x^red;0.9^reset;, +^green;20^reset;% E. Regen

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spears/Machine Pistols/Assault Rifles: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Bows/Pistols: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;

^red;Weaknesses:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Shadow, -^red;20^reset;% Fire, -^red;30^reset;% Electric
